neighborhood_overview: Our house is in small neighborhood of 12 homes on a private street that is part in Newton and part in Boston.  Once you are in the home, the orientation is towards the back and it is difficult to see or hear any neighbors.
notes: We have an excellent housekeeper who usually cleans weekly.  We pay her $120 for 4 hours.  If you want her to clean, the charge would be $80.  We pay her something to check on the house when we are away which would cover part of the cost.
transit: Oak Square is at the base of the hill on which the house is located.  There are numerous buses that run from there.  In addition, there is a new YMCA with 2 pools, lots of classes and a summer programs for kids, and friendly local library.   Newton Corner is 1.2 miles away.  There are a couple of restaurants and this is where you can catch express buses to multiple downtown locations.
access: Full access with the exception of a dark-room and knitting room in the basement. There is an attached 2 car garage.  One space will be available for use by the tenant and there is parking for additional cars in the driveway or street.
interaction: We will be in Chapel Hill. We will be available online, including FaceTime, if there are questions and have neighbors who can assist if needed.   If there are issues, we have strong relationships with tradesmen to deal with any problem immediately.
house_rules: If there are children, we would request that the tenant move various glass and pottery objects out of their reach.
host_about:
I'm  a retired technology project manager who works 1/2 time as a volunteer for the Epilepsy Foundation of New England.  My daughter lives in Chapel Hill and we spend 3 - 4 months a year there.  When we are not using one of the two homes, we make it available for rent.  
We have also rented places through Airbnb and have often found that the places aren't nearly as nice as the pictures.  We are certain that if you rent from us, you'll find our two homes are exactly as they are pictured.  The Chapel HIll Condo is 2 1/2 years old and has been used for only 12 months and the Boston home has been updated and renovated so everything is in excellent condition.

house_rules: - No shoes inside - Quiet Hours strictly enforced 10pm-7am - Absolutely no more than the number of people you booked in the house at a time - $100 fine per extra person / day - No parking in the Shared Driveway at anytime - subject to immediate towing - Cleaning fee does not include washing your dishes at the end of the stay, dirty dishes left in sink or elsewhere in the house will incur $75 extra charge for cleaners. If any dirty dishes are in dishwasher please run it before leaving.
host_about: I'm from the east coast, a transplant to paradise if you will. I love Hawaii, its amazing beaches and perfect weather, friendly people, and awesome food make me proud to call this place my new home for the last 5 years. I am happy to help show my visitors some Aloha spirit when then come here. I will do my best to make you feel at home here. Aloha!

summary: This cozy apartment is located in Brighton, about 5 miles outside of Downtown Boston. Includes are a bedroom (bed, drawer, desk, shoe rack, trash, optional additional mattress), a living room (2 couches), a kitchen (stove, oven, microwave, kettle, plates, silverware, dishwasher, trash), and 1.5 bathrooms (including 1 shower, 2 toilets, 2 sinks). There are 2 male graduate students living in this apartment, you will have to share everything except the bedroom. Anybody is welcome!

name: 30 Minutes from Downtown /Beautiful and Calm Area
summary: Only a 30 minute bus ride to Downtown Boston. Close to Boston College, Boston University,Harvard, and MIT Easy access to public transportation(Train, Bus, Hubway).  Very close to many bike paths and running paths next to the Charles River that lead into various parts of Boston and Cambridge This is a very safe neighborhood.  House is fully furnished with a king size bed in the rental room. All guests welcome. Very friendly neighbors.
space: Summary: King size tempurpedic bed and pillows. Large and fully equipped kitchen and dining table that can seat up to 10 persons. Toiletries and towels are provided. TV, cable, high speed internet, 8 movie streaming services available to use. Washer/ Dryer, Iron, and steamer is available for use. Central heat and A/C so you don't have to deal with window units.  Large two bedroom apartment. Open and large kitchen that is fully equipped and accessorized. You can cook, bake, microwave, or whatever you'd like. Pots, pans, knives, bakeware, and everything else is available to use.  The living room has two very comfortable couches with a new ultra-high definition 55' TV and Sonos surround sound system. The Apple TV  thats connected to the TV has subscriptions to Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Starz, and five other streaming services.  The bathroom is a shared space. All the basics are provided such as shampoo, body wash, hair dryer, toothpaste and new toothbrushes(because everyone forgets them). Shavi
description: Only a 30 minute bus ride to Downtown Boston. Close to Boston College, Boston University,Harvard, and MIT Easy access to public transportation(Train, Bus, Hubway).  Very close to many bike paths and running paths next to the Charles River that lead into various parts of Boston and Cambridge This is a very safe neighborhood.  House is fully furnished with a king size bed in the rental room. All guests welcome. Very friendly neighbors. Summary: King size tempurpedic bed and pillows. Large and fully equipped kitchen and dining table that can seat up to 10 persons. Toiletries and towels are provided. TV, cable, high speed internet, 8 movie streaming services available to use. Washer/ Dryer, Iron, and steamer is available for use. Central heat and A/C so you don't have to deal with window units.  Large two bedroom apartment. Open and large kitchen that is fully equipped and accessorized. You can cook, bake, microwave, or whatever you'd like. Pots, pans, knives, bakeware, and everything else
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very close to Boston College. Many restaurants are in the area within a 15 minute walk. Several parks(including dog parks), and tennis courts are with in 15-20 minute walk.  The neighborhood is close a running trail next to Charles River, public access to rowing and sailing. The residential area is pretty quiet but just around the corner from busy and fun places that are attractive to tourists. We are close to many attractions such as the Boston Common
notes: Let me know if you have an allergies ahead of time and i'll do my best to put away the peanut butter or what not.
transit: Many bus lines are within a 5-10 minute walk. The green line T rail is very close as well. The bus lines and train located nearby can take to many of the biggest attractions like Fenway Ball Park, Downtown, and even Northern Mass. The bus lines are faster as multiple express line are available and others have more direct routes to the attractions than other neighborhoods in Boston.  Free parking is available all around the neighborhood. Driveway parking is included with room rental.  Very bike friendly and next a beautiful bike path that leads to Downtown Boston, Back Bay neighborhood, and Cambridge. Thus is can connect you all around town without having to deal car traffic and your still close Harvard and MIT.
access: Guests may use all spaces including basement for temporary storage. The other bedroom is only place that off limits.
interaction: If you need help getting around I can definitely help you out. I can provide areas of interest and guide you around Boston if you'd like that. I'm available to help out during your stay. If you're visiting for school interviews or tours I can show you around campus for most schools so you can a feel for the school. I've been living in Boston for quite a while and highly recommend the city. If you're staying while you find a place to rent I can help you find a room or an apartment to rent. However, I can't really do much about realtor fees.
house_rules: NA
host_about:
I travel for work but I’m usually in Boston. I’m a dog lover and enjoy making new friends people or canine. 

I’m easy going an enjoy being outdoors even if just walking in the park.

name: Lively 1BR in Lower Allston by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the stylish, open-concept living area with stunning expansive windows, sleek fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances, and beautiful communal terrace and fitness center. Located in Lower Allston, known for its delightful restaurants and world-renowned cuisines.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the stylish, open-concept living area with stunning expansive windows, sleek fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances, and beautiful communal terrace and fitness center. Located in Lower Allston, known for its delightful restaurants and world-renowned cuisines. Located in the peaceful Lower Allston, you're an easy walk to Harvard Square and the Charles River. This neighborhood has quickly turned into a hotspot for travelers that enjoy an evening near Allston Village, while maintaining a desirable distance to the student nightlife. If you’re looking for something to do, we suggest snagging tickets to a game at the Harvard Athletic Complex just around the corner! Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call.

house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

name: 3 beds/ 2 baths in the Center of Allston
summary: This apartment is in the center of Allston, one block from the corner of Commonwealth and Harvard.  It is walking distance to clubs, bars, restaurants, stores, etc.  It is a 2 minute walk to the Green Line T (B), and the 66 and 57 buses.  It has a master bedroom with its own bathroom, plus two more bedrooms that share another bathroom.  There is central air conditioning and a washer/dryer, as well as a fully stocked kitchen.  High speed wifi and Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, HBO and Showtime.
space: Each bedroom has a queen sized bed.  The apartment was recently renovated in 2018.  So, the bathrooms and bedrooms are brand spanking new, as are the mattresses, towels and sheets.
description: This apartment is in the center of Allston, one block from the corner of Commonwealth and Harvard.  It is walking distance to clubs, bars, restaurants, stores, etc.  It is a 2 minute walk to the Green Line T (B), and the 66 and 57 buses.  It has a master bedroom with its own bathroom, plus two more bedrooms that share another bathroom.  There is central air conditioning and a washer/dryer, as well as a fully stocked kitchen.  High speed wifi and Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, HBO and Showtime. Each bedroom has a queen sized bed.  The apartment was recently renovated in 2018.  So, the bathrooms and bedrooms are brand spanking new, as are the mattresses, towels and sheets. I live only 5 minutes from the apartment so I tend to meet all of my guests. This is a neighborhood mostly filled with young people right out of college, or by grad students.  On the weekends, bars and clubs are open late, and there is lots of activity.  While the apartment is clean and fresh and provides an oasis from the bus
neighborhood_overview: This is a neighborhood mostly filled with young people right out of college, or by grad students.  On the weekends, bars and clubs are open late, and there is lots of activity.  While the apartment is clean and fresh and provides an oasis from the busy streets of Allston, it is not in a "peaceful/quiet" part of Boston.  If you are looking for no noise after 11, nearby parks for children to play, and a tree-lined street with very little traffic, this is not the apartment for you.  If, however, you are looking for a brand new, clean apartment, in a hip area, with plenty to do and lots of people, then you have come to the right place.
notes: Parking is available right across the street for $20 per night.  This parking must be arranged for by me in advance, so please be sure to let me know if you will be needing it.   However, you don't really need a car in this part of Boston as everything you could want is walking distance and Boston is accessible by T and bus within 2 minutes of the apartment.
transit: If you have a car, you are a two minute drive from an entrance to the Mass Pike.  It is less than a 10 minute drive to Harvard Square in Cambridge and maybe a 10 minute walk to Coolidge Corner in Brookline.  The Green Line and a couple of bus lines are within a 2 minute walk if you prefer public transportation.   There are hundreds of restaurants, bars, clubs, stores and shops within a 10 minute walking radius.
access: NA
interaction: I live only 5 minutes from the apartment so I tend to meet all of my guests.

neighborhood_overview: Apartment located at Allston, the border line of Boston and Cambridge. Very convenient location for traveler. Allston is known as the "student known" due to the amount of colleges near by and "foodies town" due to large amount of restaurant and bars.
notes: Potential for noise - master bedroom and living room gets noise from the road traffic nearby when windows open.  if you require quiet this might not be a good fit
transit: The closest T station would be Boston Landing Station, which is minutes away by foot. Its about 9 minutes Subway ride to Downtown Boston. Most of my guest take Bus right in front of the property! or behind the property!!! Bus 57: 12 minutes bus ride, it goes directly to Kenmore station, perfect Spot to start the day by walking down the Newbury Street and enjoy the Boston Garden. Bus 66: 13 minutes bus ride, goes directly to Harvard University.
access: Entire apartment
interaction: I live in the same building. Available when needed
house_rules: - Strictly NO PARTY POLICY!  Serious complaints of unruly behavior will unfortunately result in guests being asked to leave. - No shoes inside (请在屋内穿着拖鞋) - Quiet hours 10 pm - 8 am (安静时间10 pm - 8 am) - $20 fee if linen has non-removable stains ($20 无法清洗的床单或毛巾) - $100 for lost fob ($100 遗失电子大门钥匙) - $120 for lost garage opener ($120 遗失车库电子钥匙) - If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full. - If the apartment left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $30 for every extra hour of cleaning required.
host_about:
I'm a traveling globetrotter, real estate professional, homeowner, mother of a toddler, and also a neat freak.

I have being renting through Airbnb for 1.5 years, and really enjoyed hosting people from all walks of life. And I profoundly appreciate the extra income I was able to generate to pay for childcare. 

What differentiate me and other hosts on airbnb is: I truly care about a guest's experience especially when it comes to cleanliness and how easy it is to check in/out. I only use pure white linens and towels, and only hire the priciest/best cleaning crew in town. 

My units are priced 20% lower than other Airbnb's in the area, and at least 50% lower than surrounding hotels. Please be considerate when using AC and leave the apartment in a manageable condition to help me keep the cost low.

name: Pretty Bedroom in Brighton, Boston: BC/BU/Harvard
summary: Beautiful, fully furnished and spacious private bedroom and bathroom, both on their own floor of our lovely townhouse in the center of the pleasant & convenient Brighton neighborhood of Boston. Easy access and walking distance to buses & green-line trains to downtown Boston and Cambridge.  We are right by BC, Harvard & BU! Come stay in our house and be greeted with welcoming smiles from us: a happy young Boston couple, and our amazingly friendly dog!
space: A very comfortable and nicely-decorated private bedroom and bathroom is located on the second floor of our townhouse. The bedroom includes a comfy double bed, a TV with (Hidden by Airbnb) Chromecast (to stream from your laptop/tablet/phone), and a full closet to store away your things. The bathroom has a full bathtub/shower with great running hot water, and will have clean towels & basic toiletries, ready for your use. We live on a quiet street, so you can get a good night's rest! A washing machine and dryer are also on the 2nd floor, and can be used.

Easy access and walking distance to buses & green-line trains to downtown Boston and Cambridge.  We are right by BC, Harvard & BU! Come stay in our house and be greeted with welcoming smiles from us: a happy young Boston couple, and our amazingly friendly dog! A very comfortable and nicely-decorated private bedroom and bathroom is located on the second floor of our townhouse. The bedroom includes a comfy double bed, a TV with (Hidden by Airbnb) Chromecast (to stream from your laptop/tablet/phone), and a full closet to store away your things. The bathroom has a full bathtub/shower with great running hot water, and will have clean towels & basic toiletries, ready for your use. We live on a quiet street, so you can get a good night's rest! A washing machine and dryer are also on the 2nd floor, and
neighborhood_overview: Brighton is a wonderful combination of a 'family-friendly' and 'young' neighborhood of Boston, very close to Boston College. It is extremely safe and quiet, and we are only 3 miles west of downtown Boston, 3 miles away from Cambridge and direct neighbors to Brookline & Newton. We have direct access to the green-line trains and buses. We are also walking distance (less than 10 minutes) to numerous local restaurants, convenience stores, Cafe Nero, and Whole Foods. We are also only a 15 minute walk away from the pristine Chestnut Hill Reservoir which is a beautiful running/walking spot (1.5 mile loop) by Boston College.
notes: A requirement we have at our home is that you must love dogs! :) We have a wonderful, friendly and extremely well-behaved 5-year old dog who will be delighted to see you!  Enjoy his fun company and playing with him!
transit: We have numerous nearby options of transport to get you to downtown Boston or Cambridge. The closest bus stop is a 1 minute walk away, at the end of our street. We are also only a 10 minute walk away from the closest green line train station. Parking is free & available on our street all weekend and weeknight evenings after 6pm.
access: The kitchen (if you need to make yourself a cup of tea or grab a drink), living room, and dining room on the first floor can be accessed. (Please let me know if you are interested in an "Indian Food Experience": you could get front-row seats at our kitchen island, as I demonstrate how to cook, and serve you a delicious Indian meal with wine! $80/couple.)
interaction: We can interact with our guests as little or as much as they would like! As we only rent out the room on weekends, we will most likely be home and using the first floor (living room, dining room, kitchen). Feel free to hang out with us, or retreat to your private bedroom with your own TV on the 2nd floor.  We will definitely be present when you arrive, and will be available to answer any questions/ provide tips on the city!
house_rules: - Quiet hours after midnight.  - Please take off shoes at entrance of house. - Must love dogs (our dog)! - Can use our washing machine & dryer machine- please just ask first! - You can use our kitchen to make some tea/coffee or grab a drink (i.e. limited use). Please just ask if you need to use the kitchen, as we use it a lot ourselves! :)
host_about:
I am a working professional in the pharmaceutical industry in Boston, USA. I am happily  married and living in Boston with my husband and my wonderful dog, Gumbo. I love food, (cooking and eating)! I also am passionate about traveling across the world as much as possible (I never leave any vacation days behind)! I can't live without bread, my husband, my dog, or my family. 
My ideal holiday has a little bit of everything- some city sightseeing, but also some natural scenery mixed in. My husband and I enjoy getting to know our hosts and getting local advice from them if they live there too.

host_about:
Isaac is an architectural designer who is devoted to sustainability and the practice of green architecture. He began his dedication to sustainability when he moved to Boston, where he was to start his career at The Boston Architectural College under a Bachelor of Sustainable Design. Isaac is a multi-disciplinary designer whose work focuses on architecture and sustainable design.

3 things I cannot live without:

-My phone: Unfortunately (fortunately?) I fully embrace being connected, I love social media because I have friends all across the world, and it helps me stay in touch with people I care about.

-A good book (or 5) I'm currently reading: I like being immersed in a book. Lately, I've been reading a lot of non-fiction, but I love a good fantasy book to lose myself within.

-A good pair of headphones: I've been listening to a lot of podcasts lately, especially while I'm doing work that might be a little more tedious, or when I'm driving. 

My style of traveling: I'm not a huge planner; while traveling I like to plan for one thing to do per day, and just go wander for the rest of the day. Food is essential; it doesn't have to be fancy, but I love experiencing authentic local food and drinks

summary: This private bedroom is perfect for one or two guests who are spending any amount of time in the Boston area.  We are a same-sex couple and welcome guests of all backgrounds and identities to our home! We will be sharing common spaces (bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room) and look forward to meeting you.
space: Our apartment is located on the second floor of a two-family home in Boston. Unfortunately, we are not wheelchair accessible. You will have a private bedroom and deck. The apartment boasts a beautiful and spacious yard with a fire pit, grill, and hammock, all available for your use.  We are conveniently accessible to Downtown Boston and Cambridge via a 5 minute walk to the 57 and 86 bus routes respectively.

neighborhood_overview: We are located in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston with quick and easy access to Brookline, Cambridge, Somerville, and Downtown Boston. We are less than 20 minutes from Boston College, Boston University, Harvard, MIT, and other surrounding schools.  We are a ten minute walk from easy dining, a grocery store, the New Balance Factory, and the Bruins Practice Ice Arena (Boston Landing).  Our neighborhood is quiet and safe, and we ask that you respect our neighbors as you enjoy your time here.
notes: We will provide you with your own set of keys to use so you can come and go as you wish.
transit: We are conveniently accessible to Downtown Boston and Cambridge via a 5 minute walk to the 57 and 86 bus routes respectively.  We are five minutes from a beautiful bike trail that winds along the Charles River, and takes you downtown, to Fenway, and even to the Cambridge area. Biking is a great way to get around Boston, and we have one bike and  helmet for you to borrow.  Public transportation is very accessible in Boston. Buses are $1.70 and the trolly (T) is $2.10. We will provide you a reloadable Charlie Card which will give you access to both the bus and the T, and ask that you return it at the end of your stay.
access: We invite you to share our free washer and dryer, on-street overnight parking (4pm-10am only), gas kitchen, dining room, living room, and bathroom. You will also have access to the front porch and yard.  In addition, during your stay, we reserve the back porch for your private use. This is the only place you can smoke. Please feel free to enjoy the morning sunrise here!
interaction: We are a teacher and a social worker, and consequently quite busy. Our interaction with guests is dependent on your comfort level - we are around to troubleshoot and solve problems, hang out and have a drink in the evening, or provide travel suggestions and coupons. If you are into more solo traveling, you will find appropriate privacy and the space you are looking for here.

host_about:
My name is ChiChi. Welcome to Boston, home my sweet home! 

I have a passion for travel and all types of outdoor activities. I love meeting new people from different cultural backgrounds, which offers me the chance to interact with some amazing minds/ideas and also makes me a positive, interesting, and thoughtful person. And I have been enjoying hosting guests from all over the world and help to make their stay in Boston memorable.

I am a working professional in my early 30th with a full-time job in a well-known bank in downtown Boston. In my spare time, I travel, yoga, dance, hike, read, blog, movie, and spend quality time with my friends. I am a good cook, infusing my recipes with inspirations from world traveling. 

I can speak English, Chinese, Korean and Spanish, and I am learning French!

neighborhood_overview: Lovely, peaceful residential neighborhood with a small convenience store very close to the house, Star Market supermarket shopping plaza and elegant Japanese/ Chinese dine in restaurant just 10 min walk away.  We are just across street of German international School .There is a Swiss bakery on Western Ave about 10 min walk away and Harvard Square is approx. 15-20 min walk away.  Library and a local church is 5 min walk away.  There is a baseball field, playground, and jogging park just 10 min walk away.  Charles River is 15-20 min walk away.  Numerous shops and dining and Irish bars are on Harvard Ave 15-20 min walk away.  Fenway Stadium is 30 min walk away.  Everything is 5 min or less by car, public transportation is easily accessible.
notes: No handicapped access.  There is a flight of stairs to 2nd floor with a 2nd flight of stairs to the loft on the 3rd floor.   Rates subject to change without notice. All sales are final and nonrefundable. You have the whole house with the exception of the basement and 1 storage room on the 1st floor.  You have your own kitchen, living room, laundry, and everything else.  The perfect Home away from Home for you and your family or friends!   Business stays welcome!
transit: Bus #66 stop just about 2 min walk from house.  The #66 from Harvard Square ( in Cambridge) to Dudley Square ( Roxbury )via Brookline on Harvard Ave in the other direction.   Red line at Harvard Sq is 1 mile away. Green Line B only 3/4 of mile away. Also bus 46 to Central Square.

Biking, in door out door roller skating, tennis, basketball, restaurants, coffee and donuts, cinemas, museums, library, gift shops, gift shops , art gallery, library, sightseeing, boating. Many restaurants, bars, liquor stores.

My passion is food. I own a couple restaurants in brookline.

name: Luxurious apt in <3 of Boston. Close to BU/BC/HBS
summary: Easy, comfy, clean, and luxurious 2 bedrooms condominium located in a safe quiet neighborhood at the heart of Boston. This Apartment is fully furnished and loaded with all what home need. Each bedroom in the unit has its AC. The subway passes right front of the house. Boston University, Boston College and Harvard Business School are 10 minutes away. Harvard Ave is 2 blocks away, there you will find anything you are looking for, from Bars, restaurants, Convenient stores, and clubs since Brighton's nightlife is the best in town. The Longwood medical area is about 15 min ride. Laundry is located inside the apartment. I will provide you with towels, body wash, shampoo, Hair dryer, iron. Street parking.
space: Gorgeous apartment and the pictures speak of themselves. You will get what exactly you see in the picture.

neighborhood_overview: Brighton is a beautiful, quiet Boston residential neighbourhood with a lot to offer. Cross the street from my house you will find restaurants, Bars, Convenient stores...ect. Within a short ride you can reach the Longwood Medical Area and numerous local colleges and universities in minutes.
notes: Guest must climb stairs. Additional Services: Offers Pick up or Drop off for the Airport for $40 USD Pick up and Drop Off for Back Bay station and South Station for $30 USD.
transit: Green line T stop is located within a steps from the building main door.
access: You'll have access to the house living room, dining room, kitchen with microwave, coffeepot, stove/oven,  robot blender, toaster, and electric kettle. Basically you have access to the entire place.
interaction: I am available 24/7 to answer any question or concern, but will let you enjoy some solo time on your vacation.
house_rules: *Please confirm your check-in time prior to your arrival, and Please make sure to stick to it! Also, please make sure to give me 1 hour notice prior to your arrival to the house. By doing so you will give me enough time to head toward the house to meet you and open the door for you. *Please  place your shoes at the shoe rack once you enter the house. *Please do not leave dishes behind. Thank you
host_about: A young professional who like to travel and meet new people.

name: Entire apt in Boston neighborhood of Brighton
summary: Newly renovated 400 sq ft apartment in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston.  Dunkin' Donuts and 7-11 are within a few minutes walk.  House is on the MBTA bus route- less than a 1 min walk to stops-express buses to downtown.  20 min walk to the green line train at Boston College.  5 min car ride to Mass Pike I-90. Logan airport is a 25 minute ride. 20 min walk to the Charles  River.  Also within a few minutes walking or less are several restaurants.
space: Entire 400 sq ft apartment in a quiet multi-family home located in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston.  To ensure that all guests/tenants are comfortable and have a pleasant experience, cooking food that leaves pungent odors is not allowed.  No cooking or frying of foods, oils or spices that are heavily aromatic.  Kitchen is for light cooking only.  If this rule is broken an additional fee of $100.00 will be charged for cleaning and airing out of the apartment.  Apt includes 1 bedroom, bathroom, galley kitchen and living room. There are 2 queen sized beds, one a pull out sofa bed.  Mattresses are memory gel/foam.  Included is a 50 inch  ROKU tv, wi-fi, and Keurig.
description: Newly renovated 400 sq ft apartment in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston.  Dunkin' Donuts and 7-11 are within a few minutes walk.  House is on the MBTA bus route- less than a 1 min walk to stops-express buses to downtown.  20 min walk to the green line train at Boston College.  5 min car ride to Mass Pike I-90. Logan airport is a 25 minute ride. 20 min walk to the Charles  River.  Also within a few minutes walking or less are several restaurants. Entire 400 sq ft apartment in a quiet multi-family home located in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston.  To ensure that all guests/tenants are comfortable and have a pleasant experience, cooking food that leaves pungent odors is not allowed.  No cooking or frying of foods, oils or spices that are heavily aromatic.  Kitchen is for light cooking only.  If this rule is broken an additional fee of $100.00 will be charged for cleaning and airing out of the apartment.  Apt includes 1 bedroom, bathroom, galley kitchen and living room. There are 2 q
neighborhood_overview: Dunkin Donuts and Starbucks, 7-11 and restaurants are a few minutes walk away.  Apt is on the MBTA bus route. Steps away is the express bus to downtown Boston and other locations.  20 minute walk to the green line train at Boston College stop. 5 minute ride to Mass Pike I-90. Logan airport is a 25 minute ride. 20 minute walk to the Charles  River-rent canoes and kayaks at Charles River Canoe & Kayak: Allston Brighton location.  Free street parking.  Blue Bikes Boston bike rental  is 1.5 blocks away from the home.
notes: Cleaning fee is $75 per stay. Price listed is for 2 guests, per night.  $25 extra per guest, per night.  Please advise host if more than 2 guests will be staying.
transit: There is free street parking. Watch out for street cleaning days. Read the posted signs. Minute walk to the MBTA bus stops.  20 minute walk to the city subway-green line.  MBTA website can help plan your travel on public transportation.
access: Entire apartment. No access to outside property/yards or driveway.
interaction: I can be contacted via text.
house_rules: Please download the free Airbnb app for easy, accessible communication.  I will message you the address and entry instructions a couple days before you arrive. The keypad code will be sent separately. Thank you for booking with us.  House Rules ***A reminder: To ensure that all guests/tenants are comfortable and have a pleasant experience, cooking food that leaves pungent odors is not allowed.  No cooking or frying of foods, oils or spices that are heavily aromatic.  Kitchen is for light cooking only.  Please use the venting fan when cooking.  If this rule is broken an additional fee of $100.00 will be charged for cleaning and airing out of the apartment.***    Please, NO cars in the driveway at any time, even if just to load/unload car.  Spaces are rented and you may be towed. If an early check in is possible we will notify you on your check in date.  Otherwise, expect to check in at 3pm. Please be respectful of noise as there are other long-term tenants and guests in the building.
host_about: Our house is in a section of Boston called Brighton, which is 8 miles from the Boston Common. We love the city of Boston and have lived here for the past 25 years.

house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

name: Koreatown and BU, direct T access to downtown
summary: This space is located in center of Allston where it is predominately Korean restaurants. This is a 5 minute walk from the Harvard Ave T stop (Green line B line) that will take you directly to downtown (Park street). GREAT PLACE TO STAY DURING BU COMMENCEMENT.
space: ****NOTE**** this space is available when the tenant is on business trip. You are staying in their personal room. This is basically a short term sublet, as is, no thrills. The room is kept tidy and roommates keep the apartment tidy. Roommates are extremely friendly. VERY DIVERSE SETTING, we have different people from all over the world. It will be a very homey feeling. You are welcomed to use any of the spaces as if you were also a tenant that was living here. A white Pomeranian also lives in the apartment. He is limited to the living room only.

neighborhood_overview: Mainly Korean food, but there is a variety of options available. It is a very young area as BU is located here. Very close to Harvard University/Cambridge as well. This area is very safe. I would recommend only staying in this neighborhood or anywhere directly east (fenway, south end, north end,  Downtown) or Cambridge. Any farther west (Brighton) becomes far and expensive from Boston and anywhere south of Boston starts to get dangerous (Dorchester, Roxbury, Jamaica Plain would not recommend these neighborhoods). Quincy is much too far south (expensive and takes very long to get to Boston depending on time/day)
notes: AGAIN PARKING IS NOT READILY AVAILABLE AND YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO LOCK THE DOOR TO THE TENANTS ROOM FOR FIRE SAFETY REASONS.
transit: The T (You will need to pay in cash or have a Charlie card. You can get a Charlie card at a station) Get around with Uber. It is the most convenient. If you are not sure what uber is, please let me know.
access: You have access to my room, the bathroom upstairs, kitchen, bathroom and living room. When you first come into the apartment, you will go up the stairs to reach our apartment.
interaction: You can text me with any questions that you may have.

name: 1 bed in 3 bed and 2 bath house
summary: Spacious, clean, modern and newly renovated (2017) to give the Boston tourist the perfect experience. You'll love the location (close to restaurants and public transportation), the off-street parking (easily 2 cars), and the great backyard. Enjoy your time in Boston with this clean, safe, and inviting home!
space: Our apartment is located on a quiet dead-end street with no traffic and noise, The unit is easily accessible from Downtown Boston with bus number 501, Copley and convention centers with bus number 503, and Fenway with bus number 57. It is also close to Cambridge, MA. Perfect place to stay if you're visiting your kids attending universities like BU, BC, Northeastern University, and Harvard University.

name: Eat - Sleep - Explore - All newly renovated
summary: Completely remodeled 1100+ square foot condo w/central AC that is walking distance to the Boston Landing Train Station with service to Fenway Park, Copley Square and South Station. This condo comes complete with all new furnishings - enjoy peaceful slumbers on your Memory Foam mattresses, cook in your newly renovated kitchen with granite counters and newer appliances, rejuvenate in your spa-like bathroom with imported Italian tile. Enjoy cable TV, super high speed internet and Apple tv.
space: Architecturally, the building is considered a "3 Decker" which is a design most commonly found in New England. 3 Decker style buildings were constructed in Boston as tenement housing in the late 19th early 20th century and were mostly occupied by immigrants who worked in local factories, mills and shipyards. Over the last twenty years, however, many 3 Deckers have been converted to condos, the natural design is appealing to city dwellers who appreciate the high ceilings, bay windows and private outdoor space it affords its residents.
description: Completely remodeled 1100+ square foot condo w/central AC that is walking distance to the Boston Landing Train Station with service to Fenway Park, Copley Square and South Station. neighborhood_overview: There is a Supermarket with a Liquor Store, Starbucks, Pharmacy within a five minute walk. Restaurants and Retail, Bus Transportation, and Train to Downtown Boston are within 5-10 minute walk. Neighborhood is safe and well lit. 20 minute drive to Logan Airport. Also close to Harvard Business, New Balance, WGBH, Bruins and Celtics Training Facilities, Boston University and Boston College. Target, Home Depot, Best Buy, Marshalls, Home Goods less than a mile away.
notes: We are located in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston.
transit: There is a Commuter Rail station within walking distance (Boston Landing). At the end of my street there is bus service to Harvard & Central Square. If you have a car getting to Downtown Boston or points north, south or west of Boston are easily accessed by either the Mass Pike or Storrow Drive. Logan Airport is an easy 20 minute ride.
access: Off-street parking is available for free, however it must be reserved at the time of booking. Unrestricted street parking is available all weekend.  Mon-Friday 8am-6pm there is a loosely enforced 2-hour restriction on street parking without a resident sticker.
interaction: We have someone on site to help if needed.
house_rules: - No loud or excessive noise after 8PM - Please keep the noise down in the common hallways
host_about: Kevin and Leigha live and work in Boston, Kevin is a lifelong resident of Boston.  Part of our business is property management so our properties are always well maintained and in the unlikely event a guest has an issue we are equipped to deal with whatever the issue is promptly and professionally.  We love our city and our neighborhood, we enjoy sharing our favorite places to eat and visit with guests. We enjoy traveling ourselves, our most recent adventures took us to Cuba and Ireland, as well as ski trips to Wyoming and Utah.

name: 2BR Ideally Located Top Floor Brownstone Condo
summary: Amazingly comfortable and quiet, 2 bedroom, top floor condo with access to all Boston has to offer.  The condo is fully furnished with 2 plush queen beds, comfortable furnishings and fully equipped kitchen. Located in Cleveland Circle provides easy access to the Green Line Subway (D, C and B Lines).  Also conveniently located to Boston College (football stadium), loads of restaurants and running trails.  Have everything you would want in walking distance without sacrificing space and comfort.
space: The Condo has high speed WiFi, YouTube TV and Air Conditioning window units in the bedrooms.  Connected to the kitchen a wonderful balcony offers great city views and al fresco dining option.
description: Amazingly comfortable and quiet, 2 bedroom, top floor condo with access to all Boston has to offer.  The condo is fully furnished with 2 plush queen beds, comfortable furnishings and fully equipped kitchen. Located in Cleveland Circle provides easy access to the Green Line Subway (D, C and B Lines).  Also conveniently located to Boston College (football stadium), loads of restaurants and running trails.  Have everything you would want in walking distance without sacrificing space and comfort. The Condo has high speed WiFi, YouTube TV and Air Conditioning window units in the bedrooms.  Connected to the kitchen a wonderful balcony offers great city views and al fresco dining option. Guests have access to the entire condo. Owners are not available but a property manager is on call to answer questions and concerns. Boston Bus and Subway options are numerous from this condo.  The Green Line Subway has 3 stops within 400 meters of the condo, including the fast D line.

name: 62 Private & elegant room luxurious house - Boston
summary: My place is close to Boston University, Fenway, Kenmore square, Allston, Downtown Boston. This is a private bedroom in a beautiful house located on a quite street 1 min from Boston University, 1 min walk from public transportation, 5 min from Fenway/Kenmore, 10 min from Downtown and Harvard. Internet, and Netflix available. Have the best of both worlds: a quiet large luxurious home and fast access to the best of Boston and Cambridge. Open kitchen and refrigerator, central heat and AC, washer.
space: While this is a brand new building, with brand new amneties. This place is not for everyone. Upon booking, one of the cohosts will contact you to welcome you and give you directions for your self check in. You will follow instructions on how to find your room. Your room is equipped with a fan, large bed, a desk, and desk lamp. You will be sharing the living room, kitchen and bathrooms with other guests just like you. There are no locks to the bedrooms, or to the house doors, however the house is extremely safe and have an updated security system. There is a great backyard, and a beautiful patio.  So if you are ok with a private clean bedroom and don't mind sharing the common areas, this place is for you.

There are no locks to the bedrooms, or to the house doors, however the house is e
neighborhood_overview: When you start college in Boston, especially at BU or BC, you hear about Allston and its infamous house parties. It sounds like a magical land of freedom. This neighborhood has character and is filled with impressive street art that has been sponsored by the city to keep graffiti and “tagging” off the walls. We think this neighborhood is worth paying a visit to if you’re looking for something a little off the beaten path. A little hipster, yes, a little grungy, sure, but full of rich culture, cool cats, and great food of all types—especially all foods Asian. Its main streets are lined with places to sip, shop, shoot pool, and play old-school arcade games.
notes: Please note that we put a lot of effort and sweat in running this airbnb, and while this is a great gig, we would like you to have an unforgettable experience. USA Taxes request will be sent through airbnb after the booking is over.
transit: It's one min walk from Harvard Avenue stop on the Green line.  Our apartment is located close to: - Boston University - Boston College - Harvard University - Fenway Park Together, Allston-Brighton comprises countless super-cool niches, whether you prefer playing late-night dive bar darts or sipping early morning coffee in movie-set worthy cafes.
access: As guests you have access to the kitchen where we ask you to use it to do light meals only. You have access to the living room and bathrooms.  While our rules of the house are pretty clear regarding respect and cleanliness, we ask you to tell us as soon as something bothers you in the common area. Sometimes we cannot control what other guests do in the sharing areas, but we will do our best to follow up on a timely manner. USA Taxes request will be sent through airbnb after the booking is over.
interaction: The major interaction will be with the cohost who will be there to answer your messages and make sure your experience is excellent.
house_rules: - 1. Quiet hours in the shared areas are from 10 pm to 7 am - 2. No shoes in the house - 3. Communication of arrival time is a must, and double confirming with the host through the airbnb messaging platform about the readiness of your room is a MUST. Please any show ups to the appartment that is not scheduled will be treated as a violation. - 4. Check out is at 9 am. This is important because the cleaning team needs to come to fix the room for the next guest. Kindly respect that.  - 5. There are extra fees with additional non booked guests.  - 6. There are no keys to the room or doors but we have safe boxes to store your valuables. -7. We do have a flexible check in but this means that guests can leave their luggages in the common area while waiting for the previous guest to check out (usually at 9 am) and the cleaning team to clean the room. We want to make it so smooth for the guests, and we would appreciate your cooperation on informing us about your schedule, and we will do our dut

name: Secluded Tower Home in Bright Castle
summary: A quiet, sunny and cheerful private 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment on the 2 top floors of a large 1872 two-family house near Union Square in Allston, which our children have come to call Bright Castle.  The apartment has 2 private stairway entrances, a fully-equipped kitchen,  and an outdoor deck overlooking a garden in back. It's close to universities, 1/2 hour to Fenway by T, & not far from downtown Boston or Harvard Square, with many good restaurants, bars & music venues in the neighborhood.
space: There is a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a twin-size bed in the second bedroom, and a queen-size sofa bed in the living room - in other words, the apartment sleeps 5 (in 3 beds). There are two full bathrooms, both with showers. A fairly steep set of stairs links the two floors of the apartment, and both private entrances involve stairs. Driveway parking is available for 1 or 2 cars. Central air conditioning in the summer; central heating in winter.
description: A quiet, sunny and cheerful private 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment on the 2 top floors of a large 1872 two-family house near Union Square in Allston, which our children have come to call Bright Castle.  The apartment has 2 private stairway entrances, a fully-equipped kitchen,  and an outdoor deck overlooking a garden in back. It's close to universities, 1/2 hour to Fenway by T, & not far from downtown Boston or Harvard Square, with many good restaurants, bars & music venues in the neighborhood. There is a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a twin-size bed in the second bedroom, and a queen-size sofa bed in the living room - in other words, the apartment sleeps 5 (in 3 beds). There are two full bathrooms, both with showers. A fairly steep set of stairs links the two floors of the apartment, and both private entrances involve stairs. Driveway parking is available for 1 or 2 cars. Central air conditioning in the summer; central heating in winter. There is a small private outdoor deck f
neighborhood_overview: Allston is full of restaurants, bars & music venues - there's always something to do! It's also quite safe at all hours.
notes: The ceiling in the master bedroom is sloped and low, and may be uncomfortable for tall people. The ceilings in the rest of the house are of normal height. Our children are musicians and sometimes rehearse in the basement or in their rooms. We will of course do everything possible to minimize noise when guests are present, and we welcome requests to accommodate your schedule.
transit: It's easy to walk about locally; the #57 bus to Kenmore Square/Fenway Park stops at the corner, and it's just a few minutes' walk to the #64 & #66 buses (to Harvard Square & Central Square in Cambridge, respectively) or to the Green Line (C to Boston College, goes directly to Kenmore Square/Fenway & Downtown Boston). 1.3 miles to Harvard, 2 miles to BU, 2 miles to Boston College, 2.5 miles to Fenway, 3 miles to downtown Boston.
access: There is a small private outdoor deck for your use attached to the kitchen of the apartment, and you're welcome to spend time in the shared backyard. We have a large driveway that can accommodate 1 or 2 extra cars, & there is a private laundry room in the apartment with washer & dryer, which you are free to use. We have a lot of books in the house (in English, German and French), which you're welcome to read while you're there.
interaction: We live in the primary apartment (i.e. downstairs & next to the rental apartment), and would be happy to meet you & give advice as needed, etc. We speak German fluently, Dutch reasonably well, and can muddle along in French.
house_rules: - Smoking is not permitted in the house, but you're welcome to step out and smoke on the private deck. - The stairs connecting the two floors are fairly steep, so infants and small children would need to be closely watched, for their safety.
host_about: I'm a professor of German and Comparative Literature at Boston University (where I also teach film). I'm very fond of reading, cinema, music, cooking and traveling. My wife Silvia runs a local crafts space nearby in downtown Brighton, and my two college-age sons, Jacob and Jan (who live at home), are musicians.

summary: WiFi, TV with Netflix and Hulu! A block from public transportation to schools/ down town.  Restaurants and convenient stores nearby.
space: There is a common area with microwave, fridge and coffee maker.
description: WiFi, TV with Netflix and Hulu! A block from public transportation to schools/ down town.  Restaurants and convenient stores nearby. There is a common area with microwave, fridge and coffee maker. There is NO kitchen use allowed but there is a common area and your own private bedroom. I’m a friendly person but I will give you space :) We are in prime location for the T. Uber rides are abundant and cheap since we are pretty close to everything. Just a single train ride into Boston! PARKING ON WARREN ST: Park at 6PM you will be good until 10AM. We live in the city so after about 7-8pm it is very difficult to park and it will be up to you. NEXT BEST PARKING IS ON HARVARD AVE, then take the train up and down, use as last resort! We are on the 4th floor with no elevator.

summary: This is a luxury fully renovated exclusive villa within walking distance to Harvard University and Harvard Square.  It has 6 bedrooms & 4 Baths.  Exquisitely designed for vacationers. After recent massive renovation give this historic home a new face lift and satisfaction of all the contemporary needs. Located in a highly desirable university neighborhood can be  yours for the perfect vacation or business trip to Boston.  Offering a large eat in kitchen. all hardwood floors, modern appliances, and modern bathrooms this beautiful home away from home is the love of travelers and families alike! This house and its sister house next door have the added advantage of accommodating large groups.  Enjoy the benefit of your own home instead of searching to find enough hotel rooms. neighborhood_overview: Peaceful family neighborhood, very beautiful and highly desirable. Lovely, peacefulness but super convenient with park, shoppings , restaurants trains buses just a few steps away .There are Star Market , Swiss bakery, Starbucks , Trader Joe on Western Ave ,Cambridge St ,Everett St and Harvard Ave are the major streets where they are located . Numerous bars all in the Alkston village area only about 10 min walk away and Harvard Square is approx. 15-20 min walk away.  Library and a local church is 5 min walk away.  There is a baseball field, playground, and jogging park just 10 min walk away.  Charles River is 15-20 min walk away.  Fenway Stadium is 30 min walk away.  Everything is 5 min or less by car, public transportation is easily accessible.
notes: No handicapped access.  There is a flight of stairs from 1st to 2nd floors with a 2nd flight of stairs from 2nd to the 3rd floor. Master bedroom is on the 1st floor . 2nd floor two of the 3 bedrooms share a private in suite bath. The other bedroom has its in suite bath. Rates subject to change without notice. All sales are final and nonrefundable.
transit: Commuter rail (train) at Boston Landing is only 5 minutes walk away from this property. Subway B line is only 10 minutes walk away . Redline at Harvard Square is about 20 minute walk away. We are also close to Bus line 66 (5 minutes walk), 70, 70A , 86 (7 minutes walk). All buses connect to the subway station.
access: You have the whole house.  You have your own kitchen, living room, laundry facilities access and everything else.  The perfect Home away from Home for you and your family or friends!   Business stays welcome!
interaction: Enjoy your own private home, yard , parkings , fully furnished for the travelers just steps away from everything!  Two shopping center 5-10 minutes walk away . I am available anytime for questions or assistance.  Call during the day or text at night.
house_rules: - Quiet Hours during night time, no disturbances, loud music, parties or anything that would disturb the peace.  This is a quiet family neighborhood. - No wild parties or gatherings allowed.  Only small, civilized gatherings allowed if owner grants permission only. - No late night party, no loud music, no smoking inside the unit. Please clean your cigarette butts and do not litter on the sidewalk.  - No candles, firecrackers or any flammable or hazardous material allowed at any time in or outside the property. - Guests must always clean the dryer filter after each use. - No overnight guests allowed without permission -Put regular trash in BLACK bins only. Do not put in BLUE bins!  -BLUE bins can take glass or metal only. Nothing else. -Park only in the designated driveway parking spot.  Parking on the yard will get ticketed and guests will be responsible for the fine. -Do not put food or anything else down the sink garbage disposal or drains.  Dispose of all leftover food in the trash

name: Private Suite in Luxury Apartment
summary: This is a beautiful modern apartment located right next to Harvard Business School. Walking distance to Harvard Square and public transportation.
space: A beautiful modern apartment with private bathroom and everything you need to have a comfortable and convenient stay.
description: This is a beautiful modern apartment located right next to Harvard Business School. Walking distance to Harvard Square and public transportation. A beautiful modern apartment with private bathroom and everything you need to have a comfortable and convenient stay. You have a private bathroom, access to the kitchen and space in the refrigerator. You can access the living room and even play the piano during reasonable hours but only if you are a pianist. There  is wifi. There is washer and dryer available in the apartment. There is a 24/7 onsite gym facility. Ideally I will like to meet you and greet you in person to show you around and explain how access to the amenities. The apartment is basically on Harvard campus. There is a super market downstairs and a Starbucks as well as other restaurants and bars.There's a large field/park next to the building and its very safe. There is a bus stop right on the corner of the building to get you into Harvard Square if you are too cold to walk. It'
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is basically on Harvard campus. There is a super market downstairs and a Starbucks as well as other restaurants and bars.There's a large field/park next to the building and its very safe.
notes: This is my room mates space so some of his belongings will be in drawers and in the closet (closet is full of his stuff) etc.
transit: There is a bus stop right on the corner of the building to get you into Harvard Square if you are too cold to walk. It's a 2-3 minute bus ride. Or 10-12 minute walk.
access: You have a private bathroom, access to the kitchen and space in the refrigerator. You can access the living room and even play the piano during reasonable hours but only if you are a pianist. There  is wifi. There is washer and dryer available in the apartment. There is a 24/7 onsite gym facility.
interaction: Ideally I will like to meet you and greet you in person to show you around and explain how access to the amenities.
house_rules: No Smoking, and no guests that are not listed on itinerary
host_about:
Recent Harvard Graduate class of 2018 :) Master of Finance 

I am very down to earth, very friendly and always happy to help in any way that I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible in any one of my properties. I am only a message away :).

I was born and raised in Elizabeth, NJ and know the area very well, this is where most of my listings are located 5 minutes from EWR Newark Liberty International Airport. 

At the moment I split my time between New Jersey and Boston, Massachusetts and focusing more on being an entrepreneur rather than finding work. I truly love the Airbnb concept and hope to have listings all over the world some day :). I also have a car rental business that works on a similar platform as Airbnb called TURO. 

I am very interested in all Asian cultures and love meeting people from that part of the world. I hope to live there some day.  My family is from Ecuador and I have double citizenship for United States and Ecuador.

summary: This is an incredibly well located basement apartment with 1 Free parking spot, we have 2 Bedrooms/1 Bathroom. Excellent location, only 2 blocks away the T( Subway) or Bus stop. summary: This is a renovated, and incredibly well located apartment, we have 2 Bedrooms/1 Bathroom, we have an excellent location if you want to take the T or Bus. We also have one free private parking spot!  The area offers a great variety of restaurants, bars, shopping, coffee shops, pharmacies, and more all located within walking distance. No parties allowed!
space: ✌ THIS IS WHAT WE OFFER -One queen size bedroom+ 1 bunk bed, and one queen size bedroom, and also you can use the living room as another bedroom with a comfortable sofa bed in case you need it.  - Fully stocked kitchen, pans, skillets, cutting board, kitchen utensils, etc - 3rd Level Apartment - Fresh sheets and towels provided. - Soap & shampoo provided. - High speed internet. - Streaming TV - Proactive support from your hosts. -  A/C units in the living room and bedrooms. Strong enough to cool down the apartment. - There is coin laundromat in the corner in front of the building!  - Anything else you might need just ask us and we'll do our best to accommodate.   ✌  NEAR BY – T (subway): 5 min walk.  – Grocery store (Allston Convenience Store) : 3 minutes walk – Fenway Park: 11 minutes by car – Lots of restaurants: 5 minutes walk – Lots of bars: 5 minutes walk – CVS Pharmacy: 5 minutes walk – Coolidge Corner Theater: 16 minutes walk – Boston University: 5 minutes by car – Harvard Unive

Strong enough to cool down the apartment. - There is coin laundromat in the corner in front of the building!  - Anything else you might need just ask us and we'll do
neighborhood_overview: We are located in a great and safe neighborhood, we are really close to BU and all the iconic places in Boston such Hardvard, MIT, Fenway and more, the T and bus station are located 2 blocks from our apartment, and all kind of restaurants such Asian, American, Italian and more are located on walking distance too. In a few words we have an awesome location that offers safety, comfort and more!
notes: One night stay is available if the night is by itself!  For example: If Monday is not available, Tuesday is available, and Wednesday is not available, then feel free to book for Tuesday night! Contact us for more information or any questions! The apartment is located on the 2nd floor and the building has not elevators.
transit: Bus, T station, Uber, easy access to everything!
access: EASY ACCESS: You don't have to worry about getting the key from us, we have a keypad lock that allows you to get into our house 24/7 entering a 4 digit code. Are you driving? We have one FREE parking spot waiting for you. You will receive a parking permit for this and very detailed instructions of how to park. Is this apartment taken? Check out our other apartments! Feel free to contact us about it and we'll accommodate you :) BOSTON/ALLSTON: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27606782 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27598072 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27606245 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27625553 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27595884 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27627681 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27625757 BELMONT/ CLOSE TO CAMBRIDGE: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27577512 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27485647 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27576455 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27488452 ARLINGTON: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/27628144
interaction: We won't be there unless required! If you need us we are here 24/7 for you!
house_rules: - We just want you to know some little things - -Please be respectful of our neighbors. - -No parties - -No Pets - -Please clean up after yourself - -Please conserve water, electricity, heating, and AC as much as possible. - -Check in time is at 3:00 pm - -Check out time 11:00am - -No Smoking ($200 fine will be charged if you smoke inside the house) - - Just treat this house like your house….easy!!
host_about:
I came from  Venezuela. I am a retired entrepreneur ,  I used to work on water purification and ice production.

I love traveling with my wife May, and meeting new people. We are so excited to host you at our place! 

Regards! 

Ignacio

name: Boston Condominium
summary: Bright, airy, sunny one bed found on first floor of Victorian home.  Private entrance and private porch. Features hwd floors, high ceilings,large living room with flat screen TV , sleeper sofa, work space and dining area. Bedroom offers queen bed and television. Fully equipped kitchen. Coin-op laundry, on sight parking. Pets considered. Quiet tree-lined street , but steps to restaurants,shops and 3 different green line trains. Easy commute to City, Boston College and Boston University.
space: Bright and spacious one bedroom, sit outside and enjoy peace and relaxation on private porch with bistro table and chairs. some pets considered, additional cleaning fee applies.  $15 charge per night for parking.

interaction: Welcome to STARS of Boston (short term apartment rental solutions of Boston) , we offer several short term apartment options. Our team tries to provide personal and attentive service to our guests. We are local, respect guests privacy, but always available in needed. After your reservation has been confirmed, we will email you a contract for you to review and sign. The contract will just outline the basic house rules. Pets are considered on a case by case basis. Please let us know if you will be bringing a pet. There is an additional $150 pet cleaning fee as the apartment has to go through a special cleaning after your stay. Guests bringing pets will be required to sign a pet contract.
house_rules: - Professional building,no parties allowed
host_about: born and raised in Boston, I have been a real estate agent for 14 years in Brookline Mass.

name: Comfy Room Close To Harvard BS
summary: Off a Main Street to Harvard Yard. 10 min. walk to Harvard Business School. My house is aVictorian old home close to public transportation, coffee shops, supermarkets, library and the Charles river.
space: During your stay you will be sharing a bathroom and living room with the host and her family. The rooms have a full size bed, a small closet , a night stand, a dresser and a desk.
description: Off a Main Street to Harvard Yard. 10 min. walk to Harvard Business School. My house is aVictorian old home close to public transportation, coffee shops, supermarkets, library and the Charles river. During your stay you will be sharing a bathroom and living room with the host and her family. The rooms have a full size bed, a small closet , a night stand, a dresser and a desk. You can use washer and dryer for light washing an drying if you are staying more than five days. You’ll share the apartment with me, my son and husband. We are quiet. It is safe and in the middle of a community full of students and regulars. There may be one car space in a tandem parking if it is first arranged with hosts. In a radius of a block you can take different buses to Harvard square, Central square, Lower Allston ant the rest of the city. This is an old, lovely place, therefore, needs to be treated carefully. Be gentle by not discarding any type of wet towels and feminine sanitary products down the toilet

notes: This is an old, lovely place, therefore, needs to be treated carefully. Be gentle by not discarding any type of wet towels and feminine sanitary products down the toilet.

interaction: You’ll share the apartment with me, my son and husband. We are quiet.
house_rules: 1: If you use anything in the kitchen, you must clean up after yourself 2: No loud noise 3: Discard feminine care products in the garbage 4: Use of the washer/dryer is only for long term guests (1 week+) 5: Lights should be turned off when they are not in use. 6: Rinsed plastic containers must be placed in the recycling bins.
host_about: I am a teacher about to retire who has loved teaching special education students for the last 30 years. My husband, son and I love walking around the city. When I am not walking, I love reading and watching public television.

name: Modern & Spacious 4 Bedroom 15 mins to Downtown!!
summary: FULLY FURNISHED with queen size beds in 3 rooms, and a full in the 4th each with brand new comfortable mattresses, TVs, nightstands, dressers, towels, coffee maker, shampoo, soap, bedding, pillows, comforters, & more! There is a game table with full poker set, cards, and other games! The location is amazing, & there is bus stops nearby that take you to Kenmore Square, Downtown Boston, and other parts of the city very quickly. Several restaurants nearby, and the neighborhood has so much to offer!
space: This unit is large, modern, and overall in very good shape. Each room has its own lock with keys, a ceiling fan, brand new flat screen smart-TVs equipped with WiFi, Netflix, and access to other apps. There is a game space set up with a full poker set, as well as other games to choose from. Free coffee, and a full kitchen with stove, oven, microwave, plates, dishes, silverware, etc. I hope you enjoy your time here!

The neighbors are very friendly! There is several places to eat, drink, and socialize nearby and the neighborhood is awesome!
notes: NA
transit: Bus stops nearby, walking distance to many establishments such as 7/11, papa johns, and many nice bars and restaurants plus other entertainment. There is also hubway bikes close by that can be rented at anytime with an app.
access: The unit has a lot of open space, nice bathroom, full kitchen with virtually everything you would need and most else you’d expect to find in an apartment.
interaction: I am always available by phone, text, or email and want to make sure that my guests are always happy and comfortable! :)
house_rules: NA
host_about:
Hi all,

My name is Mike, & I've lived in Boston my entire life. My number one goal as an Air B&B host is to make your stay in Boston a great one! My fiance & I have agreed that our top priority is making guests feel happy, comfortable, and safe. Please let me know if you have any suggestions for us on how we can make guests happier, and I look forward to having you stay at our place. Thanks!

name: Boston guest suite
summary: Beautiful, private garden entrance guest suite steps from the T with free parking! Amazing location. Lots of light.
space: A beautiful hideaway,  one bedroom with a stylish living room and fresh bathroom.  The bed room has an option of two singles or a large King bed. You can let your self in with the lockbox on the door.
description: Beautiful, private garden entrance guest suite steps from the T with free parking! Amazing location. Lots of light. A beautiful hideaway,  one bedroom with a stylish living room and fresh bathroom.  The bed room has an option of two singles or a large King bed. You can let your self in with the lockbox on the door. Patio right outside the apartment. A few blocks from the beautiful Brighton reservoir as well as coffee shops and restaurants in Washington square, Cleveland circle, and Brighton center. The Green line that takes you straight to downtown is a few steps away along with city buses.

house_rules: Dear guest please follow the house rules, it is important for us to keep our house clean and comfortable for every one. 1- no shoes at home ( feel free to bring ur own sleeper)  2- no smoking at home or at the garden  3- no extra electric Heaters or other things inside the room with out host permission. 4- please give us call one hour before reaching to our place, call or message both is fine. It is important for us as host to know the exactly arrival time of our guests. 5- no extra guest over night with out host permission. 6- please wash your dishes and clean the stove after using the kitchen, it is very import for us to respect all the guests at home  7- do not leave the hair inside the bathroom, shower, bathtub, leave the rest room and bathroom clean after use  8- you will have to share bathrooms with other guests, if you are not comfortable sharing the bathrooms with others please DO NOT BOOK this room.  9- some people who have sensitive ears might find it little bit noisy at nigh
host_about:
I am an architect. I am fortunate to work/study full time between great cities such as Miami, Boston, New York, Providence, Istanbul & Baku. Airbnb is a side gig. Some places are very basic, others are of great value. My places are for people traveling on a budget. I have great cohosts that will take care of you in case I am not available. I love to travel, and connect with people. This account is professionally managed. 
 
 Life Moto: 
 “We are all travelers in this world. From the sweet grass to the packing house, birth till death, we travel between the eternities.”

name: Modern & Spacious Room 15 minutes from Downtown!
summary: The Prudential Room is a large private bedroom, with lock & key. Free wifi is offered along with a free netflix login on a brand new 32" smart-TV. Full length mirror, large closet, and a ceiling fan. The unit is kept clean, and we take guest-satisfaction very seriously. Free coffee is offered, as well as a gaming area in the living room. Many bars, restaurants, and other attractions just steps away, and there is multiple bus routes to Fenway, downtown, and more!

name: ★Classic Boston★ 2BR/1BA ★ Close to T
summary: Welcome to Boston! Our classic 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment is the perfect fit for your visit. The Apartment is located in the heart of the college district of Boston within a 2 minute walk to the train to bring you to all of you favorite Boston attractions. Come enjoy your Boston stay at our cozy apartment, it’s exactly what you are looking for!   Enjoy your stay! Mariana ♥
space: We are so excited to host you at our Boston apartment! Our classic garden level apartment is perfect for visiting local colleges or coming to see all of Boston’s Glory! The floor plan comes complete with kitchen, dining, and a living room, creating the perfect place to unwind after exploring all Boston has to offer. The kitchen is complete with all the necessities to create a gourmet meal or just a quick bite.  Too tired from exploring the city, there are plenty of local restaurants nearby for dining in or take out.  Please enjoy our included Wifi, fresh towels and anything that you would need for your stay.

neighborhood_overview: Brighton/Allston is a wonderful neighborhood, you'll find within walking distance local stores, convenience stores, restaurants to dine in or take out; there's a lot of collages nearby, so you'll find a lot of students walking the streets. You will have a little park nearby where you can take a walk and relax. Friendly and nice streets to walk around.
notes: You'll have access to the laundry in the basement of the building; this are coin machines =)
transit: We're located 2 min walking from Warren st green t stop, which will take you anywhere you want to go.  We offer you a free parking spot on premises; we will provide you a parking permit which you will need to place on the dashboard of your car during your stay.  The parking lot is located at the back of the building entering from Warren St, 1st exit on your right. You can park in any spot numbered from 28 down. DO NOT park in any of the spots where the sign that says "PARKING BY SAMIA CO, PERMIT ONLY" begins, if so, your car could be towed and we don't want that. Thank you in advance for understanding =)
access: You will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: I totally respect your privacy, but if there's anything you need from me during your stay, let me know and I'll be there as soon as possible.

The room has a Queen bed, TV, and much else. Shared bathroom and kitchen area. Large closet with shelves and storage. Book case for storing clothes, towels, etc. Brighton is a beautiful place. As part of the City of Boston, it is one of the most interesting neighborhoods, and has a lot of history just like Boston. The unit is very close to Saint Elizabeth's Hospital. There is no off street parking, however there is parking on-street for free. Just be sure to read all of the signs and be careful not to park in the wrong place. You could be ticketed, or even towed. notes: I have a small maltipoo named Charlie. He lives on the 1st floor and go to camp during the day so he won’t be a bother.

neighborhood_overview: We are in a great location, 5 min away from "Cufflin St Bus Stop" and just off the Massachusetts Turnpike (I-90) in Oak Square, close to BC, BU,  Harvard University, MIT, Downtown/Boston. The YMCA(gym) is a few minutes walk distance if you feel like a work out! There are many places to eat and socialize within walking distance. Oak Square has lots of bars and restaurants,  places to play Billiards-The Last Drop  Darts-Castle alike.  Pizza place:  Pizza Rail
notes: Dear Guests,  Please do NOT wear shoes in the house (slippers provided) Please wash your dishes. Please leave Bath tub clean ( No hairs) CHECK IN: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  CHECK OUT: 11:00 Every guest gets one bath towel and one hair towel. Please be courteous to your guest mates when it comes to bathroom use. For this is a shared space. 15 - 30min max per person. Thank you!  :)
transit: 5 minutes walk to the bus stop and get the 57 bus to Kenmore Square in 15 mins and get the 504 express bus to Copley Squre, Boston, Downton etc. in 15 mins.

name: Nice place walk to BC lots of free street parking
summary: Sunny second floor apartment.   Two bedrooms and sunroom with pullout couch.   Couch  and  good quality air mattress.    Easy street parking with no resident sticker.   Walk to B.C. (the football stadium).  Twenty minute walk to the headquarters for the Boston Bruins  and Celtics.  Fifteen minute drive or direct bus to Fenway, BU, HBS, Copley, Harvard Square. There are two flights of stairs to the apartment.    There are bannisters on both sides of stairs to keep it safe and they are wide.
space: Keyless entry with code.  Great kitchen with everything.    Dining room that seats eight people Wi-fi and cable.  Three TVs with Rokus.  Access to Cable, Netflix and Hulu.    Renovated bathroom.  Memory foam mattress with electric positioning in the master bedroom.
